reviews.review: I first played the game back in 2000. It's kinda cool for it to have evolved, but still be easily playable and familiar.

Very addictive. Grew up with Counter-Strike. Some people can be toxic but it's not as bad as most people say. Simple to understand but hard to master, and there's a lot to learn from weapon spray patterns to callouts. If you're a very competitive person this game can fuel your competitive needs.
Very fun, would recommend to anyone who loves first person shooters.
Fantastic game, still play it to this day.

very good game. fun to play.
very consistent gameplay, but cheaters are still an issue
Game is fun to play occasionally, a good pick up game for friends, and has a large skill gap but is still very fun at the lower ranks. Would definitely recommend buying prime.

¿Juego? Bueno. ¿Jugabilidad? Hay que adaptarse. ¿Comunidad? Una putisima mierda. Hackers, trolls y gente que suda mucho de las calls y tu polla sobre todo cuando quieres tomartelo en serio. ¿Medidas contra esto? Ponerlo gratis y hacer que todo el juego se infecte aun más y no con ello, si te toca un hacker en tu equipo, preparate que tu también vas a ser castigado por ello te guste o no.
It's fucking shit, but I can't stop fucking playing it. I'm too fucking addicted >:(

Caso você procure uma experiência que vai exigir o máximo de suas habilidades como jogador e que não tem medo de puni-lo por erros, Global Offensive é uma ótima opção. Mesmo se tratando de uma reformulação de um game antigo, existem poucos títulos no mercado capazes de fornecer uma experiência tão envolvente e desafiante quanto à do jogo da Valve.
